title: I AM PISSED
body:
4000 IP IS MISSING FROM MY ACCOUNT

I DON'T KNOW WHY 
RIOT FIX THIS PROBLEM 
THAT'S TIME, OK?!!!!

replies.body:
Hey! 

In the future, I'd highly encourage you to be clear in the description of your post, as something labeled 'I AM PISSED' doesn't describe the in-game issue you're having.

If you're missing IP from your account, it may be a visual glitch. If that's the case, you'd just need to restart your client. If you find that the IP is actually missing, please hit up [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be happy to take a look at your account and see what happened to your IP. :)
